site.title: Fandy & Rob — Somerset Seaside Wedding
site.description: All the details for Fandy and Rob’s relaxed seaside reception at Brent House Restaurant with travel, stay, and local tips.

hero.description: Join us for a sun-drenched summer afternoon with coastal breezes, hearty Somerset flavours, and the people we love most.

ourStory.intro: From Brighton beach dates to Somerset escapes, our story has always been tied to the sea. We’re so excited to celebrate that with you.

timeline.headline: First seaside stroll
timeline.description: Met through friends and spent a windswept evening wandering along Brighton Pier, chatting until the lights came on.

timeline.headline: A home near the coast
timeline.description: Settled into our own place within walking distance of the water – weekend coffee runs quickly became a ritual.

timeline.headline: The question on Sand Bay
timeline.description: Rob proposed during a golden-hour walk along Sand Bay in Somerset. Fandy said yes just as the tide rolled in.

schedule.subtitle: Times may flex slightly with the tides — we’ll keep this page updated.

items.title: Arrivals & welcome drinks
items.description: Grab a glass, enjoy the gardens, and settle in with acoustic tunes.

items.title: Toasts & stories
items.description: A few words from family before we sit for dinner.

items.title: Somerset feast
items.description: Brent House carvery classics, veggie plates, and seaside-inspired desserts.

items.title: Dancing & photos
items.description: Live DJ, twinkling bunting, and a sunset photo wander if the weather cooperates.

items.title: Sparkler send-off
items.description: Gather outside for one last glow before we call it a night.

schedule.note: If you’re travelling from Weston, allow time for taxis — Apple Taxis know the route well.

venue.description: Brent House is a beloved local carvery with whitewashed walls, driftwood accents, and a garden that catches the evening light.

travelStay.intro: Most guests are staying in Weston-super-Mare for the weekend — it’s got classic arcades, sandy stretches, and plenty of brunch spots for the morning after.

travel.detail: Free on-site parking at Brent House. Pop ‘TA9 4HL’ in your sat-nav.
Apple Taxis Weston • +44 1934 666666 • book returns when you arrive.
Weston-super-Mare connects easily to Bristol Temple Meads and London Paddington via GWR.

registry.intro: We’re lucky to have everything we need, but if you’d like to honour Taiwanese tradition we’ll have red envelopes ready for cards, cash, or cheques.

items.question: Is there parking at the venue?
items.answer: Yes! Brent House has a dedicated car park with step-free access to the reception space.

items.question: Will the celebration be indoors or outdoors?
items.answer: Dinner and dancing are indoors with airy windows; drinks and sunset photos will be outside if the weather agrees.

items.question: What about dietary requirements?
items.answer: Share notes in your RSVP — the kitchen team can cater for veggie, vegan, gluten-free, and halal guests with notice.

rsvp.deadline: Kindly reply by 1 April 2026 so we can confirm numbers.

gallery.intro: A little inspiration for the pastel bunting, sea-sparkle palette, and coastal flowers we’re planning.

images.alt: Sunlit dunes leading down to a calm sea
Pastel bunting fluttering along a seaside promenade
Soft blue and shell-pink bridal bouquet

contact.note: For travel questions, message Rob; for accommodation or translation support, reach out to Fandy.
